survey_name: Consumer Preferences for Subscription-Based Skincare Services Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand consumer preferences, satisfaction levels, and pain points related to subscription-based skincare services to help providers enhance their offerings.

questions.question_text: How long have you been subscribed to a skincare service?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button layout for clarity. Ensure options are mutually exclusive.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE (radio buttons). Randomize option order to reduce bias.

script.question_text: How long have you been subscribed to a skincare service?

questions.question_text: What factors influenced your decision to subscribe to a skincare service? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: Only ask if respondent selected any option other than 'I am not currently subscribed' in Q1
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections. Include an 'Other' field with text input to capture unique responses.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE (checkboxes). Add optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What factors influenced your decision to subscribe to a skincare service? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: Only ask if respondent selected any option other than 'I am not currently subscribed' in Q1

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the customization of products in your skincare subscription?
questions.routing_logic: Only ask if respondent selected any option other than 'I am not currently subscribed' in Q1
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale with a neutral midpoint. Label all options for clarity.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE (radio buttons). Display vertically to avoid crowding.

script.routing_logic: Only ask if respondent selected any option other than 'I am not currently subscribed' in Q1

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for your current skincare subscription service?
questions.routing_logic: Only ask if respondent selected any option other than 'I am not currently subscribed' in Q1
questions.client_notes: Use an open-text field to capture detailed feedback. Limit response to 500 characters.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: OPEN_TEXT. Add character counter and validation.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for your current skincare subscription service?
script.routing_logic: Only ask if respondent selected any option other than 'I am not currently subscribed' in Q1

questions.question_text: Which of the following would make you more likely to subscribe to a skincare service? (Select up to 3)
questions.client_notes: Limit selections to 3 to prioritize preferences. Randomize option order except for 'Other'.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE (checkboxes) with max 3 selections. Enforce limit via validation.
